name: Duck Shooting
description:
SYNOPSIS

Beat your Records in this simple but addictive Duck Shooting HyperCasual Game, with a fun VoxelArt and PixelArt style. Accumulate Bonus, share your results and show that you are the best!

CONTROLS

Use your mouse to navigate the menus, and move the shooting pointer.

With the Mouse's Left Click, select options from the menus and Shoot.

With the “M” key mute/unmute the game audio.

With the Escape key, it shows the Pause window during Gameplay.


TIPS

Hit the Rubber Ducks to get Points!

Avoid hitting the Vampi Ducks, they will subtract 50% of your points!

Don't get bitten by the Dracu Ducks! They will absorb 25% of your time!

Hitting a Super Duck will spawn a Bonus Balloon!


CREDITS  Art 2D & 3D

Azucena López

Game Design & Programmer

Manu Moral

Background music

Fun Time by Dj Quads


Minimum requirements and recommendations

Windows 10.

Recommended: 10Gb Free on the hard drive (Game: 150MB)

4Gb RAM.

Recommended play on  Full Screen.

The mouse is needed.

Website: Lava Candy Games
